instruction.value: Apply topically per 10 cm2 area affected 30 to 60 minutes prior to procedure.
Apply topically up to 10 cm2 area affected 60 minutes prior to procedure.
Apply topically up to 20 cm2 area affected 60 minutes prior to procedure.
Apply topically up to 100 cm2 area affected 60 minutes prior to procedure.
Apply topically up to 200 cm2 area affected 60 minutes prior to procedure.

additionalnotes.value: ADULT: up to 10 g for leg ulcer mechanical cleansing/debridement, gential mucosa surgical procedures.

ADULT: up to 10 g for leg ulcer mechanical cleansing/debridement, gential mucosa surgical procedures. Up to a total of 60 g for dermal procedures on intact skin performed on larger areas (in a hospital setting).
NEONATES / INFANTS: up to 3 months of age or less than 5 kg body weight. Minimal gestational age is 37 weeks.
INFANTS: 3 to 12 months of age and greater than 5 kg body weight.
CHILDREN: 1 to 6 years of age and greater than 10 kg body weight.
CHILDREN: 7 to 12 years of age and greater than 20 kg body weight.

ahfsname.value: Skin and Mucous Membrane Agents, Antipruritics and Local Anesthetics
